src:
Shopee Liga 1 2019: 3 Pemain Terbaik dan Pelatih Pekan ke-25
01 Nov 2019, 09:52 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Seluruh pertandingan pekan ke-25 Shopee Liga 1 2019 sudah tuntas digelar. Dari sembilan pertandingan yang bergulir, tersaji berbagai aksi menarik dari aktor lapangan hijau dan racikan jitu dari para pelatih.
Bali United semakin kukuh di puncak klasemen sementara Liga 1 2019. Keberhasilan mengalahkan Barito Putera membuat tim berjulukan Serdadu Tridatu ini mengumpulkan 54 poin dari 23 pertandingan.
Sementara itu, Madura United masih setia mengejar Bali United. Berada di posisi kedua, Greg Nwokolo dan kawan-kawan terpaut sepuluh angka.
Pekan ke-25 Liga 1 2019 juga menyajikan pertandingan seru antara Persib Bandung melawan Persija Jakarta. Tuan rumah berhasil memetik poin penuh dengan menang 2-0.
Lantas, siapa saja pemain dan pelatih yang memberikan penampilan gemilang? Berikut ini tiga pemain dan pelatih yang layak mendapatkan predikat terbaik pada pekan ke-25 Shopee Liga 1 2019 seperti dilansir Bola.com:
text:
Shopee Liga 1 2019: 3 Best Players and Coaches of the 25th Week
Nov 01 2019, 09:52 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Shopee Liga 1's 25th Week 2019 match has already been held. Of the nine games that rolled, presented a variety of interesting actions from green field actors and telling concoctions from the coaches.
Bali United is getting stronger at the top of the 2019 league standings. The success of beating Barito Putera made the team nicknamed Serdadu Tridatu collect 54 points from 23 matches.
Meanwhile, Madura United is still faithfully pursuing Bali United. In second place, Greg Nwokolo and his friends are ten points adrift.
Week 25 of League 1 2019 also presents an exciting match between Persib Bandung against Persija Jakarta. The host managed to pick the full points with a 2-0 win.
So, who are the players and coaches who give brilliant performances? Here are three players and coaches who deserve the best title in Week 25 of Shopee Liga 1 2019 as reported by Bola.com:
